Twelve months ending 30 June of year stated.
Content of all copper-bearing materials in the form they are to be used or exported.
Excluding copper content of iron pyrites.

Source: Country Economic Review, Asian Development Bank (Manila).
Data refer to copper and molybdenum ores.
Twelve months ending 31 March of year stated.
